{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17382v1", "title": "Excited oscillons and charge-swapping", "summary": "We show that the charge-swapping phenomenon can be understood as a real
valued oscillon carrying an excitation in imaginary direction in the target
space. Furthermore, we introduce a two dimensional collective model which
quantitatively captures the charge swapping dynamics.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th", "published": "2025-04-24T08:58:58Z"}
